abstract: Apollo’s newest fund, the largest in its history, underscoring investors’ confidence that firm can find buying opportunities at a time when stock prices have risen drastically.

lead_paragraph: Leon D. Black, the head of Apollo Global Management, said last year that his firm was “selling everything that’s not nailed down.”

headline.main: Apollo Secures $18.4 Billion War Chest for Private Equity
